itemInfo.itemName: Steel Taritas Gloves of Iron Wall
itemInfo.itemDesc:
Energy of iron wall is contained within this Steel Taritas Gloves
Lighter than ordinary Taritas Gloves of Iron Wall, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Gloves of Iron wall, Steel Taritas Gloves, Taritas Gloves

item.name: Steel
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards and Coal together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Hard Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying dinosaur, lizard, or worm hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Mud Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Mud Crystals found near Glish Ruins.

item.name: Steel Taritas Gloves
item.desc: Steel Taritas Gloves made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Gloves.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Grade 1 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Gloves
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Gloves with maximum potential
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas gloves, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Gloves
